## Style.used() method

[https://www.w3.org/TR/css-cascade/\#used](https://www.w3.org/TR/css-cascade/#used)

**Signature:**

```typescript
used<N extends Name>(name: N): Option<Value<Style.Computed<N>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | N |  |

**Returns:**

Option&lt;[Value](./alfa-style.value.md)<!-- -->&lt;[Style.Computed](./alfa-style.style.computed.md)<!-- -->&lt;N&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

In our case, we do not resolve further (e.g., `width: auto`<!-- -->). However, we filter out properties that do not apply to certain elements.
